short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in the warmth of a crackling fire with this Chrome extension featuring a realistic, burning fireplace.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whether you’re working or relaxing, the soothing ambiance of a cozy fire enhances your new tab experience.

Features:
🔥 Realistic Fireplace Animation: Watch the flames burn and crackle, creating a calming and relaxing atmosphere.
🌄 Day & Night Mode: The scene shifts from day to night, with the fire glowing brighter in the evening.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Conveniently search the web while enjoying the fire's warmth.
🕒 Clock & Date Display: Always know the time with the integrated clock and date display.
📌 Add Custom Shortcuts: Quick access to your favorite websites right from the new tab.
Why Download?
This Chrome live wallpaper extension transforms your new tab into a peaceful haven, providing the perfect atmosphere for relaxation and focus.

Get it today and enjoy a cozy, burning fireplace every time you open a new tab!
